title: Send a Birthday Offer
description: It's the first day of the month, and the marketing system needs to send a special birthday offer to all loyalty members whose birthday is this month.

tasks.description: A scheduled job runs to find all loyalty members with a birthday in the current month.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates the target audience list.

tasks.description: The system sends each of these customers a 'Happy Birthday!' email containing a special discount coupon.
tasks.expected_outcome: A personalized and timely offer is sent to drive engagement and sales.

tasks.description: The system logs the campaign send for tracking purposes.
